[GRAMMAR]: Subject-verb agreement errors (e.g., "had fail to eradicate" → "had failed"; "We decide" → "We decided").
[SPELLING]: "dernier cri" (correct but archaic; potential confusion for modern readers).
[SYNTAX]: Occasional awkward sentence structures (e.g., "We like to be dernier cri even in Much Moreham").

[STRUCTURE]: Mild abruptness in transitioning between dog breed discussion and tram scene (contextualized as chapter start).
[CLARITY]: Minor ambiguity in " Isle of Dogs" misconception (resolved through dialogue).
